mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQP_LOG (LOG_ID , CRT_DT , CRTR , EMP_ID , EQP_ID , STTS) VALUES ('EL-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_EQP_LOG_PK.NEXTVAL,5,'0') , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , #{empId} , #{eqpId} , #{stts})
mapper.select: SELECT LOG_ID , CRT_DT , CRTR , EMP_ID , EQP_ID , STTS FROM EQP_LOG
